title: Monsanto 's number of regular and temporary workers worldwide 2013 to 2017
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 2 different Worker Types on X-axis for 5 groups 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Number of employees.
Worker Type Regular workers had the maximum Number of employees among all 5 groups, and it was for 2015. The minimum Number of employees was observed in Worker Type Temporary workers for 2017.
There is a gap of 17500.0 between the highest and lowest Number of employees found for 2016 in Worker Type Regular workers and Temporary workers.

On average, the Worker Type Regular workers had the highest Number of employees for all 5 groups 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017. Whereas Temporary workers had the lowest average Number of employees.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 2 different Worker Types on X-axis for 5 groups 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Number of employees.
For Worker Type Regular workers, 2015 had the highest Number of employees 22500.0 among the 5 groups and in Temporary workers, 2017 had the lowest Number of employees 2800.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 2 different Worker Types on X-axis for 5 groups 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Number of employees.
Worker Type Regular workers had the maximum Number of employees among all 5 groups, and it was for 2015. The minimum Number of employees was observed in Worker Type Temporary workers for 2017.
There is a gap of 17500.0 between the highest and lowest Number of employees found for 2016 in Worker Type Regular workers and Temporary workers.

On average, the Worker Type Regular workers had the highest Number of employees for all 5 groups 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017. Whereas Temporary workers had the lowest average Number of employees.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Number of employees on the Y-axis for 2 different Worker Types for 5 groups 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017 that are presented on the X-axis.
Worker Type Regular workers had the maximum Number of employees among all 5 groups, and it was for 2015. The minimum Number of employees was observed in Worker Type Temporary workers for 2017.
Among all the Worker Types, 2016 had the highest Number of employees 20800.0 in Worker Type Regular workers and lowest value 3300.0 in Worker Type Temporary workers.
There is a gap of 17500.0 between the highest and lowest Number of employees found for 2016 in Worker Type Regular workers and Temporary workers.
Among the groups, 2015 had the biggest difference in Number of employees. Where the maximum Number of employees was 7.5 times larger than the minimum Number of employees.

2015 had the maximum Number of employees out of all 5 groups in Worker Type Regular workers followed by 2015 in Regular workers, and the minimum Number of employees is found for 2017 in Temporary workers.
Averaging all 5 groups 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017, the Worker Type Regular workers is the maximum Number of employees and Temporary workers is the minimum Number of employees.
